short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Business texting for your employees and candidates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text message employees, candidates and other people easily through TeamTexter on your mobile without having to give out your own phone number. 

* Quickly add people.
* Organize people into groups. 
* Group text message.
* Send and schedule text messages.
* Tag people and messages.
* Star people, groups and messages.
* See quick stats.

Do more with TeamTexter's web app including setting up automated workflows, drip campaigns, bulk add people, email parsing to text and more!

Have questions? We always welcome your questions, suggestions and comments! Contact us at support@teamtexter.io anytime!
